lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame basketball coach Morgan Wootten will receive a kidney from his 33-year-old son, Joe, in an operation scheduled for next month. Morgan Wootten, 75, had the highest all-time winning percentage for a high school coach, .869 (1,274-192), over 46 years at DeMatha in Hyattsville, Md. He had a liver transplant in 1996.
